entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
@NYGovCuomo Of course a COVID19 vaccine would be available to all. There’s no incentive to limit availability. 

Suggesting it would be “available only to the rich or privileged” is class warfare rhetoric, abused by the rich or privileged to manipulate the populace at large.
